packs.title: Chest Pain
packs.base_mdm_template: Patient evaluated for chest pain with focused assessment for life-threatening etiologies, targeted diagnostics, and risk-stratified disposition.

risk_toggles.label: HEART score documented
risk_toggles.sentence_template: HEART score = {value}; risk stratification discussed and disposition determined accordingly.

risk_toggles.label: Serial troponins reassuring
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Serial troponins obtained and reassuring.

risk_toggles.label: ECG without ischemic changes
risk_toggles.sentence_template: ECG reviewed without acute ischemic changes.

risk_toggles.label: PERC negative
risk_toggles.sentence_template: PE considered; patient is PERC negative and low risk, so further PE testing not indicated.

risk_toggles.label: Wells low + D-dimer negative
risk_toggles.sentence_template: PE considered; Wells low risk and D-dimer negative, so PE effectively excluded without imaging.

risk_toggles.label: CTA PE considered / not indicated
risk_toggles.sentence_template: CT pulmonary angiography considered; not indicated given low clinical suspicion and reassuring evaluation.

risk_toggles.label: Low suspicion dissection
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Aortic dissection considered; low clinical suspicion based on history/exam and available diagnostics.

risk_toggles.label: CTA aorta considered / not indicated
risk_toggles.sentence_template: CTA aorta considered; not indicated given low clinical suspicion and reassuring evaluation.

packs.title: Shortness of Breath
packs.base_mdm_template: Patient evaluated for dyspnea with cardiopulmonary differential, focused diagnostics, and risk-stratified disposition.

risk_toggles.label: PERC negative
risk_toggles.sentence_template: PE considered; patient is PERC negative and low risk, so further PE testing not indicated.

risk_toggles.label: Wells low + D-dimer negative
risk_toggles.sentence_template: PE considered; Wells low risk and D-dimer negative, so PE effectively excluded without imaging.

risk_toggles.label: CTA PE considered / not indicated
risk_toggles.sentence_template: CT pulmonary angiography considered; not indicated given low clinical suspicion and reassuring evaluation.

risk_toggles.label: CXR without consolidation
risk_toggles.sentence_template: CXR reviewed without focal consolidation.

risk_toggles.label: No volume overload on exam
risk_toggles.sentence_template: No clinical evidence of volume overload on exam.

risk_toggles.label: Improved with treatment in ED
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Symptoms improved with ED treatment and patient remained stable.

packs.title: Abdominal Pain
packs.base_mdm_template: Patient evaluated for abdominal pain with broad intra-abdominal differential, serial abdominal exams, and risk-based testing/disposition.

risk_toggles.label: CT A/P considered / not indicated
risk_toggles.sentence_template: CT abdomen/pelvis considered; not indicated given low suspicion and reassuring evaluation.

risk_toggles.label: US RUQ reviewed
risk_toggles.sentence_template: RUQ ultrasound reviewed without acute cholecystitis.

risk_toggles.label: Lipase reassuring
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Lipase reviewed and not consistent with pancreatitis.

risk_toggles.label: No peritonitis
risk_toggles.sentence_template: No peritoneal signs on exam.

packs.title: Headache / Neuro
packs.base_mdm_template: Patient evaluated for headache/neuro complaint with focused exclusion of intracranial and infectious emergencies.

risk_toggles.label: Neuro intact
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Neuro exam non-focal.

risk_toggles.label: No meningismus
risk_toggles.sentence_template: No meningismus on exam.

risk_toggles.label: CT head reviewed
risk_toggles.sentence_template: CT head reviewed without acute intracranial abnormality.

risk_toggles.label: SAH rule negative
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Low suspicion for SAH based on history/exam and decision rule criteria.

packs.title: Fever / Sepsis Evaluation
packs.base_mdm_template: Patient evaluated for febrile illness with infectious source assessment and sepsis risk stratification.

risk_toggles.label: Sepsis screen considered
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Sepsis considered; patient {value} meet criteria for severe sepsis/septic shock during ED course.

risk_toggles.label: Lactate reassuring
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Lactate reviewed and reassuring.

risk_toggles.label: Blood cultures obtained
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Blood cultures obtained.

risk_toggles.label: Improved / stable vitals
risk_toggles.sentence_template: Patient remained hemodynamically stable with improvement during ED course.
